title: COVID-19 Tracker
desc: • Built an app that allows users to search countries and displays data with graphs and charts  • Integrated with COVID-19 API to render data using Chart.js and Material-UI

title: NYC Subway
desc: • Developed an app that allows users to search and display NYC Subway arrival times by integrating with 3rd-party wrapper around MTA API and Moment.js

title: PM Shop
desc: • Website that allows user to browse products and add to cart  • Features filterable list of products, add and remove items from cart, responsive design, Hooks, and dynamic routing using React-Router

title: Weather App
desc: • Built a weather app that allows users to search by City or Zip Code and display data using a weather API

title: JUMPEACH
desc: • Built an app that allows users to search countries and displays data with graphs and charts  • Integrated with COVID-19 API to render data using Chart.js and Material-UI

title: Haven
desc: • Platform for artists and performers to showcase their talents and find clients based on their local availability and collaborate (artists, photographers etc.)

title: Life Calculator
desc: • This iOS app allows users to plan and rate their goals in customizable categories  • Integrated Core Data for user data and used animation and graphics for UI

title: LOBO
desc: • An interactive mobile application mockup using Adobe XD which allowed users to easily access and navigate global database of Marriott’s architectural designs

title: Motion Graphics Project
sub: Short personal animation project made with Adobe After Effects
